Public Attributes

BYTE DestinationIP [4]
 IP Address to send raw traffic (TS packets) to.
BYTE SubnetMask [4]
 Subnet Mask for the device.
BYTE DefaultGatewayIP [4]
 Default gateway to be used by the device for IP traffic that is not on the same subnet as the device.
WORD DestinationUDP
 UDP port to send raw traffic (TS packets) to.
BYTE ReceiverIP [4]
 The IP address to assign to the receiver.
WORD StatusPort
 The UDP port used for sending status. It has to be one of the auto detect status ports. The function GetAvailablePort() can be used to get a value for this parameter.

Detailed Description

Network Configuration Structure for an S75 Version 2.X device.

Pass a pointer to a populated instance of one of these to configureNetwork() if you are programming an S75 V2.X Device.

Member Data Documentation

BYTE S75D_NetSetting::DestinationIP[4]

IP Address to send raw traffic (TS packets) to.

BYTE S75D_NetSetting::SubnetMask[4]

Subnet Mask for the device.

BYTE S75D_NetSetting::DefaultGatewayIP[4]

Default gateway to be used by the device for IP traffic that is not on the same subnet as the device.

WORD S75D_NetSetting::DestinationUDP

UDP port to send raw traffic (TS packets) to.

BYTE S75D_NetSetting::ReceiverIP[4]

The IP address to assign to the receiver.

WORD S75D_NetSetting::StatusPort

The UDP port used for sending status. It has to be one of the auto detect status ports. The function GetAvailablePort() can be used to get a value for this parameter.
